info.title: NgeFlyAja
info.description: Airfare Application API Documentation This comprehensive API documentation provides developers with the necessary resources to integrate airfare booking functionalities into their applications. The API offers the following key features: -> User Management: Securely manage user accounts with registration and login endpoints. -> Flight Search: Retrieve and display available flight routes and schedules, empowering users to find the most suitable travel options. -> Transaction Processing: Seamlessly process payments using the Midtrans payment gateway, ensuring secure and reliable transactions. Developer: [Aldy Ramadhan Syahputra](https://github.com/aldyrmdhns) | | [Adam Arrahman](https://github.com/Dams168) | | [Via Angelyca Patricia](https://github.com/Jaketus0) | | [I Putu Adi Widya Nata](https://github.com/putuadi302) | Some useful links: - [Repository](https://github.com/kelompok8-NgeFlyAja/BackEnd-Development) - [Midtrans Simulation Payment](https://simulator.sandbox.midtrans.com)
